schema.name: healthyfied salmon vegetable pancake (copy)

recipeInstructions.text: Start by dicing the bell pepper and chopping the red onion. Shred the red cabbage finely.
Drain and flake the pink salmon from the can.
In a large bowl, beat the eggs thoroughly.
To the beaten eggs, add diced bell pepper, chopped onion, shredded red cabbage, flaked pink salmon, tomato puree, and Kewpie Mayo. Mix well.
Melt the salted butter on a pan over medium heat. Pour the mixture into the pan, spreading evenly.
Cook the pancake for about 4 minutes on one side, then carefully flip it over.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the top and cook for another 4 minutes until the cheese is melted and the pancake is cooked through.

schema.description: Dive into a mouthwatering experience with our healthyfied salmon vegetable pancake! This recipe is a perfect blend of high-protein, low-carb, high-sodium, and high-fiber ingredients designed for those who love to keep their meals nutritious without sacrificing flavor. Featuring the goodness of pink salmon, mozzarella cheese, fresh veggies, and a touch of Kewpie Mayo, this dish brings a delightful fusion of tastes that makes eating healthy an absolute pleasure. Ideal for anyone following a diet focused on healthful recipes, this pancake promises a tasty and nourishing meal.
